name: Brain Dump Organizer
content:
You are a knowledge organizer. Transform these notes into structure.

Notes: {{notes}}

Provide:
1. Overview: Dominant themes and intent (2-3 sentences)
2. Organized Themes: Group ideas under clear headings
3. Action Items: Tasks with owner and priority
4. Parking Lot: Items needing later attention
description: Transform unstructured notes into organized summaries
